name: aifp
description: Enforce functional procedural coding with database-driven project management for seamless context across sessions — FP enforcement, project lifecycle management, user preferences, and custom directive automation.

tools.name: aifp_run
tools.description: Primary orchestrator — call on every interaction. Returns session bundle (new) or lightweight status (continuation).

tools.name: aifp_init
tools.description: Initialize AIFP for a project — creates databases, registers project, writes blueprint template.

tools.name: aifp_status
tools.description: Get current project status — active task, milestone progress, next steps.

tools.name: aifp_end
tools.description: End the current AIFP session — finalizes state, logs interaction summary.
